title: Authme问题
author: .OwO.
txt_content:
Authme报错崩服 版本5.4.0[22:13:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 3/WARN]: [AuthMe] Error during SQL operation: [SQLException]: database connection closed
[22:13:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 3/WARN]: [AuthMe] Plugin AuthMe v5.4.0-b1877 generated an exception while executing task 63
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
        at fr.xephi.authme.ConsoleLogger.writeLog(ConsoleLogger.java:240) ~[?:?]

        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_261]

        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_261]复制代码

replies.txt_content:
1.16.1 authme会报错 用不了 考虑换一个登陆插件
